description: Quality surf wear since 1973—backed by our Ironclad Guarantee. This 100% recycled polyester/cotton T-shirt is made with 4.8 plastic bottles and 0.3 pounds of cotton scrap, using 96% less water and creating 45% less CO2 than a conventional cotton T-shirt. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Quality Surf Pocket Responsibili-Tee - Mens
